title: Eco-Modern Family Home with Outdoor Oasis in Jeżyce
description: This exceptional three-bedroom, two-bathroom house in the heart of Jeżyce boasts 142 sqm of carefully curated, eco-friendly living space. The light-filled, newly renovated interior features sustainably sourced hardwood floors and contemporary finishes throughout. A thoughtfully designed open-plan kitchen connects effortlessly to a tranquil outdoor dining area, perfect for entertaining or relaxing with family. Well-insulated for comfort year-round, this home strikes a seamless balance between elegance and environmental responsibility.
neighborhood_description: Nestled within Poznań’s vibrant and modern neighborhood of Jeżyce, this address offers a unique blend of energetic urban development and a relaxed pace of life. Residents enjoy superb access to public transport and safe bike lines, while the local scene is filled with new restaurants, green spaces, and family-friendly amenities. Despite the dynamic setting, the peaceful, suburban vibe makes it an oasis for professionals and growing families seeking stability within reach of city delights.
lifestyle_benefits: peaceful suburban vibe in a modern setting
close proximity to parks and cafes
easy access to city center by bike or transit
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-conscious professionals, couples, or small families looking to settle in a sustainable, thoughtfully designed home with excellent access to urban conveniences and nature alike.
market_positioning: Positioned in the booming Jeżyce market, this property stands out for its modern features, focus on sustainability, and location in a sought-after urban neighborhood favored by long-term residents seeking lasting value.
